channel.title: RichScape Base Source--HELP >~!*CLICK HERE*!~<
channel.description:
-In RichScape you cannot drop stuff, trade stuff, and you don't lose things when you die...
- How do i make it so you do lose things when you die? [s]- How do i make it so you can trade again?[/s] [s]- How do i make it so you can drop stuff again?[/s]
[b]THE STRUCK OUT ITEMS WERE RESOLVED[/b]
HELP IS GREATLY APPRECIATED ;D

item.title: RichScape Base Source--HELP >~!*CLICK HERE*!~<
item.dc:creator: @life-scape life-scape
item.description:
@life-scape wrote:

All you have to do it search this in your client.java

“You cannot trade with players” <<or whatever it says when you try and trade.

When you find it change the player rights from 0 to 6.

Read full topic

item.title: RichScape Base Source--HELP >~!*CLICK HERE*!~<
item.dc:creator: @Picoscape Picoscape
item.description:
@Picoscape wrote:

Life-scape, can you give me the code that allows you to trade? I got dropping back but can’t seem to get trading no matter what I do.

I will work on losing things when you die. Please post the code if you could be so kind!
Thanks!

Read full topic
